overview:
Yoram has 16 years of experience in management and software development at startups and large enterprises, with expertise in high performance, large scale distributed systems.

Yoram recently co-founded LTS Commerce, a stealth mode e-commerce related startup. Prior to LTS Commerce, Yoram founded IvyHorseman, where he worked on a mobile local discovery product. Prior to Ivyhorseman, Yoram served as VP Engineering and a member of the executive team at Marketcetera, where he lead Engineering, QA, Support and Professional Services. Before Marketcetera, Yoram worked as a director of engineering at Yahoo!’s Search Marketing Group. Yoram also held positions at Inktomi and Seerun, as well as IBM, where he worked as a research associate in the distributed systems group. Yoram holds masters and bachelors degrees in computer science from the Technion Institute of Technology in Israel.
